title: Add GPT-OSS support to autopilot CLI and GUI
description:
Integrate GPT-OSS as a selectable agent in both the autopilot CLI and GUI interfaces (d-019 Phase 5).

Tasks:
1. Add --agent gpt-oss flag to autopilot CLI
2. Add gpt-oss to agent selection dropdown in GUI
3. Create /api/local-inference/config endpoint for model configuration
4. Add model download/status endpoints
5. Update GUI to show local model status
6. Add configuration UI for llama.cpp server URL and model selection
